page.title: 12Singleton School
page.content: Built in 1961,the school is the only one in Singleton.Including a grass area at the side,the school covers 1.5 acres. There are 56 pupils at the school:26 boys and 30 girls.There are 3 members of staff,including the teaching headmaster,Mr White. There are various activities arranged for the pupils' benefit including computer club,music group,and swimming,which they learn in their own pool. All the children from the school go on to Bishop Luffa or the High Schools,in Chichester. The school is part of the Goodwood area,enabling the pupils to take part in many competitions.
